molzbh wrote:
>
> Pardon me if this is a repeat email, I was't sure my previous posted.
>
> I am having issues with making this thing run on Windows, I have read
> the FAQ, made the .bat scripts, read the User Manual and so on,
> problem is that my Job Status shows running, however there is no
> activity. I got the following log in the local-errors.log, I am unable
> to figure out what could be wrong.
>
> java.io.IOException: Failed to get host craigslist.org address from
> ServerCache
> at
> org.archive.crawler.fetcher.HeritrixProtocolSocketFactory.getHostAddress(HeritrixProtocolSocketFactory.java:172)
>
> Please advise. My guess is that this should be fine on a Linux Box,
> ill try the same.
>
> regards,
> Anmol
>
>
